document_data.name: Specialty Priest of Arvoreen
document_data.mainbody: '''Specialty priests of Arvoreen''' were worshipers of [[Arvoreen]], the Defender, within [[Luiren]] in the [[Shining South]].
document_data.Abilities: These [[specialty priest]]s could imbue a single target with incredible strength once per day. As their powers grew they could imbue the strength to more targets to a maximum of three per day. They could [[turn undead]] like normal [[priest]]s. Many were also skilled warriors.
document_data.Possessions: They did not have weapon restrictions and trained with the [[short sword]] first. The heaviest [[armor]] they were permitted to wear was [[chainmail]] and they did not carry a [[shield]].
